scripts.build: bundle install --path vendor && JEKYLL_ENV=production jekyll build -d public/
scripts.minify: node_modules/.bin/cssmin public/css/main.css > css/main.min.css && cp css/main.min.css public/css/main.min.css
scripts.sync: aws s3 sync public/ s3://s3-sebastianklier.com/ --delete --cache-control max-age=86400
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run minify && npm run sync && npm run clear-cache
